channel.title: AI & Telecom News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI & Telecom insights curated by N8N + Perplexity

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Telecoms must adopt generative AI to reduce costs, drive growth, improve security, and transform into tech companies offering automated, AI-powered services.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Morgan Stanley's Tech, Media & Telecom 2025 report highlights emerging generative AI trends shaping the future of technology, media, and telecom industries.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The telecom industry is rapidly adopting generative AI, with half of surveyed companies having already implemented their first AI solutions by 2025.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The article highlights 150 AI use cases from startups, featuring Cursor, an AI-powered code editor with advanced generative AI and autonomous agent capabilities.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Deloitte's 2025 telecom outlook highlights generative AI as a key growth driver, with telcos exploring ways to capitalize on its expanding opportunities.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Singtel Enterprise aims to become an AI-first telco by investing in AI technologies like network slicing, digital twins, and autonomous networks.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: EY warns the telecom sector faces increasing risks from AI adoption challenges, ineffective digital transformation, and a shifting geopolitical landscape.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Generative AI, combined with zero trust and quantum encryption, is driving a transformative growth wave in telecom enterprise security through AI-native platforms.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The Richmond Fed questions whether the current surge in AI investments resembles the 1990s telecom boom and impending bust.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A new report reveals 83% of telco leaders fear falling behind and urges urgent adoption of Gen AI to achieve productivity gains desired by 63% of the industry.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Keysight Technologies will showcase its AI-enabled 6G and advanced wireless solutions at a technology event from October 8–11, 2025.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Malaysia launches Ryt Bank, its first AI-powered bank, while Google’s Veo 3 AI video creation tools become widely available, highlighting AI's transformative impact.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: ZTE advances smart network solutions by integrating AI with telecommunications to enhance intelligent connectivity and innovation.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The European Commission will unveil a new strategy on October 8 to promote AI adoption across multiple European sectors.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A global study of 100+ tier-1 telecom executives reveals significant opportunities and practical applications for generative AI in the telecom industry.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Telefónica highlights the integration of generative AI, foundational models, and synthetic data by major public cloud providers AWS, Azure, and GCP as key future trends.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: PwC's 2025 AI Business Predictions highlight key trends and strategies driving AI's impact on business transformation across industries.
